Class ParsingException

  • Object
    • Throwable
      • Exception
        • net.sf.iptablesJava.rules.ParsingException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ParsingException
extends Exception
    Exception throwed when an error occurs in rule parsing
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ParsingException(int line)
      Create an exception using only the line number where the parsing error occurs
      ParsingException(int line, String message)
      Create an exception using the line number where the parsing error occurs and an error description message
      ParsingException(String message)
      Create an exception using only a message to describe the error
